text: Let's Make Love is a 1960 American romantic musical comedy movie directed by George Cukor and starring Marilyn Monroe, Yves Montand, Tony Randall, Gene Kelly, Bing Crosby, Frankie Vaughan. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and was nominated for Academy Award in 1961. ==Other websites== * * Category:1960 romantic comedy movies Category:1960 musical movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American musical movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by George Cukor
title: Let's Make Love
